verbose_text: E2 also contributes to the segregation of viral DNA in the cell division process by tethering the viral DNA to the host chromosome through interaction with Brd4 and/or ChlR1, both of which can bind to chromatin.
evidence: E2 also contributes to the segregation of viral DNA in the cell division process by tethering the viral DNA to the host chromosome through interaction with Brd4 and/or ChlR1
